analyzed: amarakośe evam nāmaliṅga anuśāsanam khāṇḍa
nāmaliṅgānuśāsanam nāma amarakoṣaḥ
prathamam kāṇḍam
maṅgala ācaraṇam
yasya jñāna dayā sindhoḥ agādhasya anaghāḥ guṇāḥ

original: (1.0.2) sevyatāmakṣayo dhīrāḥ sa śriye cāmṛtāya ca
analyzed: sevyatām akṣayaḥ dhīrāḥ sa śriye ca amṛtāya ca
prastāvanā
samāhṛtya anya tantrāṇi saṃkṣiptaiḥ pratisaṃskṛtaiḥ
saṃpūrṇam ucyate vargaiḥ nāmaliṅga anuśāsanam
paribhāṣā
prāyaśas rūpa bhedena sāhacaryāt ca kutracid
strī pum napuṃsakam jñeyam tad viśeṣa vidheḥ kvacid

original: (1.0.7) bhedākhyānāya na dvandvo naikaśeṣo na saṃkaraḥ
analyzed: bheda ākhyānāya na dvandvaḥ na ekaśeṣaḥ na saṃkaraḥ
bhinna liṅgānām anuktānām kramāt ṛte

original: (1.0.9) triliṅgyāṃ triṣviti padaṃ mithune tu dvayoriti
analyzed: tri liṅgyām triṣu iti padam mithune tu dvayoḥ iti
niṣiddha liṅgam śeṣa artham tu anta atha ādi na pūrva bhāj
svarga vargaḥ
svara vyayam svarga nāka tridiva tridaśālayāḥ

original: (1.1.12) suraloko dyodivau dve striyāṃ klībe triviṣṭapam
analyzed: suralokaḥ dve striyām klībe triviṣṭapam
amarāḥ nirjarāḥ devāḥ tridaśāḥ vibudhāḥ surāḥ
su parvāṇaḥ sumanasaḥ tridiva īśāḥ divaukasaḥ
āditeyāḥ diviṣadaḥ lekhāḥ aditinandanāḥ
ādityāḥ ṛbhavaḥ svapnāḥ amartyāḥ amṛta andhasaḥ
barhiḥ mukhāḥ ṛtu bhujaḥ gīrvāṇāḥ dānavārayaḥ

original: (1.1.18) vṛndārakā daivatāni puṃsi vā devatāḥ striyām
analyzed: vṛndārakāḥ daivatāni puṃsi vā devatāḥ striyām
āditya viśvavasavaḥ tuṣita ābhāsvara anilāḥ
mahārājika sādhyāḥ ca rudrāḥ ca gaṇadevatāḥ
vidyādhara apsaraḥ yakṣa rakṣaḥ gandharva kiṃnarāḥ
piśācaḥ guhyakaḥ siddhaḥ bhūtaḥ mī devayonayaḥ
asurāḥ daitya daiteya danuja indrāri dānavāḥ
sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ buddhaḥ dharmarājaḥ tathāgataḥ

original: (1.1.28) munīndraḥ śrīghanaḥ śāstā muniḥ śākyamunistu yaḥ

analyzed: sa śākyasiṃhaḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ śauddhodaniḥ ca saḥ
gautamaḥ ca arkabandhuḥ ca māyādevīsutaḥ ca saḥ
dhātā abjayoniḥ druhiṇaḥ viriñciḥ kamalāsanaḥ
sraṣṭā prajāpatiḥ vedhāḥ vidhātā viśvasṛj vidhiḥ
viṣṇuḥ nārāyaṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ vaikuṇṭhaḥ viṣṭaraśravāḥ
vasudevaḥ sya janakaḥ saḥ eva ānakadundubhiḥ
aravindam aśokam ca cūtam ca navamallikā
nīlotpalam ca pañca ete pañcabāṇasya sāyakāḥ
unmādanaḥ tāpanaḥ ca śoṣaṇaḥ stambhanaḥ tathā
saṃmohanaḥ ca kāmaḥ ca pañca bāṇāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
brahmasūḥ viśvaketuḥ syāt aniruddhaḥ uṣāpatiḥ
indirā loka mātā mā kṣīrodatanayā ramā
śaṅkhaḥ lakṣmīpateḥ pāñcajanyaḥ cakram sudarśanaḥ

original: (1.1.66) kaumodakī gadā khaḍgo nandakaḥ kaustubho maṇiḥ
(1.1.67) cāpaḥ śārṅgaṃ murārestu śrīvatso lāñchanaṃ smṛtam
analyzed: cāpaḥ śārṅgam murāreḥ tu śrīvatsaḥ lāñchanam smṛtam
aśvāḥ ca śaivya sugrīva meghapuṣpa balāhakāḥ
sārathiḥ dārukaḥ mantrī hi uddhavaḥ ca anujaḥ gadaḥ
garutmān garuḍaḥ tārkṣyaḥ vainateyaḥ khageśvaraḥ
īśvaraḥ śarvaḥ īśānaḥ śaṃkaraḥ candraśekharaḥ

original: (1.1.81) vyomakeśo bhavo bhīmaḥ sthāṇū rudra umāpatiḥ

analyzed: ahirbudhnyaḥ ṣṭamūrtiḥ ca gajāriḥ ca mahānaṭaḥ
kapardaḥ sya jaṭā jūṭaḥ pinākaḥ jagavam dhanuḥ
pramathā syuḥ pāriṣadā brāhmī ityādyāḥ tu mātaraḥ
vibhūtiḥ bhūtiḥ aiśvarya maṇima ādikam aṣṭadhā

original: (1.1.86) aṇimā mahimā caiva garimā laghimā tathā
analyzed: aṇimā mahimā ca eva garimā laghimā tathā
prāptiḥ prākāmyam īśitvam vaśitvam ca aṣṭa siddhayaḥ
āryā dākṣāyaṇī ca eva girijā menakātmajā

original: (1.1.92) karmamoṭī tu cāmuṇḍā carmamuṇḍā tu carcikā
analyzed: tu
api ekadanta heramba lambodara gajānanāḥ
bāhuleyaḥ tārakajit viśākhaḥ śikhivāhanaḥ
indraḥ marutvān maghavā biḍaujāḥ pākaśāsanaḥ
vrīddhaśravāḥ sunāsīraḥ puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ
jiṣṇuḥ lekharṣabhaḥ śakraḥ śatamanyuḥ divaspatiḥ
sutrāmā gotrabhid vajrī vāsavaḥ vṛtrahā vṛṣā
saṃkrandanaḥ duścyavanaḥ turāṣāh meghavāhanaḥ
ākhaṇḍalaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ tasya tu priyā
pulomajā śacī indrāṇī nagarī tu amarāvatī
hayaḥ uccaiḥśravāḥ sūtaḥ mātaliḥ nandanam vanam
syāt prāsādaḥ vaijayantaḥ jayantaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ

original: (1.1.112) hrādinī vajramastrī syāt kuliśaṃ bhiduraṃ paviḥ

analyzed: śatakoṭiḥ svaruḥ śambaḥ dambholiḥ aśaniḥ dvayoḥ
vyomayānam strī nārada ādyāḥ sura ṛṣayaḥ
syāt sudharmā deva sabhā pīyūṣam amṛtam sudhā
pañca ete deva taravaḥ mandāraḥ pārijātakaḥ
santānaḥ kalpavṛkṣaḥ ca puṃsi vā haricandanam
sanatkumāraḥ vaidhātraḥ svarvaidyau aśvinīsutau
nāsatyau aśvinau dasrau āśvineyau ca tau ubhau
striyām bahuṣu apsarasaḥ svarveśyāḥ urvaśī mukhāḥ
hāhā hūhūḥ ca evamādyāḥ gandharvāḥ tridivaukasām
agniḥ vaiśvānaraḥ vahniḥ vītihotraḥ dhanañjayaḥ
kṛpīṭayoniḥ jvalanaḥ jātavedāḥ tanūnapāt
barhiḥ śuṣmā kṛṣṇa vartmā śociṣkeśaḥ uparbudhaḥ
rohitāśvaḥ vāyusakhaḥ śikhāvān āśuśukṣaṇiḥ
saptārcīḥ damunāḥ śukraḥ citrabhānuḥ vibhāvasuḥ
śuciḥ appittam aurvaḥ tu vāḍavaḥ vaḍavānalaḥ
vahneḥ dvayoḥ jvāla kīlau arciḥ hetiḥ śikhāḥ striyām
triṣu sphuliṅgaḥ gnikaṇaḥ saṃtāpaḥ saṃjvaraḥ samau
ulkā syāt nirgata jvālā bhūtiḥ bhasita bhasmanī

original: (1.1.135) kṣāro rakṣā ca dāvastu davo vanahutāśanaḥ
analyzed: kṣāraḥ rakṣā ca dāvaḥ tu davaḥ vanahutāśanaḥ
rākṣasaḥ koṇapaḥ kravyād srapaḥ āśaraḥ
yātudhānaḥ puṇyajanaḥ nairṛtaḥ yātu rakṣasī
pracetāḥ varuṇaḥ pāśī yādasāṃpatiḥ appatiḥ
śvasanaḥ sparśanaḥ vāyuḥ mātariśvā sadāgatiḥ
prakampanaḥ mahā vātaḥ jhañjhā vātaḥ sa vṛṣṭikaḥ
prāṇaḥ u pānaḥ samānaḥ ca udāna vyānau ca vāyavaḥ

original: (1.1.149) śarīrasthā ime raṃhastarasī tu rayaḥ syadaḥ
analyzed: śarīra sthāḥ ime raṃhaḥ tarasī tu rayaḥ syadaḥ

original: (1.1.150) javo 'tha śīghraṃ tvaritaṃ laghu kṣipramaraṃ drutam
analyzed: śīghram tvaritam laghu kṣipram aram drutam
satvaram capalam tūrṇam avilambitam āśu ca
satate na arata aśrānta saṃtata avirata aniśam
nitya anavarata ajasram api atha atiśayaḥ bharaḥ
ativela bhṛśa atyartha atimātra udgāḍha nirbharam
tīvra ekānta nitāntāni gāḍha bāḍha dṛḍhāni ca

original: (1.1.156) klībe śīghrādyasattve syāt triṣveṣāṃ sattvagāmi yat
analyzed: klībe śīghra ādi asattve syāt triṣu eṣām sattva gāmi yat
asya udyānam caitraratham putraḥ tu nalakūbaraḥ
kailāsaḥ sthānam alakā pūrvimānam tu puṣpakam
syāt kinnaraḥ kimpuruṣaḥ turaṅgavadanaḥ mayuḥ
nidhiḥ nā aśevadhiḥ bhedāḥ padma śaṅkha ādayaḥ nidheḥ
mahāpadmaḥ ca padmaḥ ca śaṅkhaḥ makara kacchapau
mukunda kunda nīlāḥ ca kharvaḥ ca nidhayaḥ nava
vyomavargaḥ
dve striyām abhram vyoma puṣkaram ambaram
nabhaḥ ntarikṣam gaganam anantam suravartma kham
viyat viṣṇupadam vā tu puṃsi ākāśa vihāyasī
syāt tat avyam
tārāpathaḥ ntarikṣam ca meghādhvā ca mahābilam
vihāyāḥ śakune puṃsi gagane puṃnapuṃsakam
diś vargaḥ

original: (1.3.173) diśastu kakubhaḥ kāṣṭhā āśāśca haritaśca tāḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ tu kakubhaḥ kāṣṭhāḥ āśāḥ ca haritaḥ ca tāḥ
prācī avācī pratīcyaḥ tāḥ pūrva dakṣiṇa paścimāḥ
uttarā diś udīcī syāt diśyam tu triṣu diś bhave
avāk bhavam avācīnam udīcīcīnam udak bhavam
pratyak bhavam pratīcīnam prācīnam prāc bhavam triṣu
indraḥ vahniḥ pitṛpatiḥ nairṛtaḥ varuṇaḥ marut
kuberaḥ īśaḥ patayaḥ pūrva ādīnām diśām kramāt

original: (1.3.181) budho bṛhaspatiśceti diśāṃ caiva tathā grahāḥ
analyzed: budhaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ca iti diśām ca eva tathā grahāḥ
puṣpadantaḥ sārvabhaumaḥ supratīkaḥ ca diggajāḥ
klība avyayam tu apadiśam diśoḥ madhye vidiś striyām
abhyantaram tu antarālam cakravālam tu maṇḍalam
abhram meghaḥ vārivāhaḥ stanayitnuḥ balāhakaḥ
kādambinī megha mālā triṣu megha bhave bhriyam
stanitam garjitam meghanirghoṣe rasita ādi ca
śampā śatahradā hrādinī airāvatyaḥ kṣaṇaprabhā
indrāyudham śakradhanuḥ tat eva ṛjurohitam
vṛṣṭi varṣam tad vighāte vagrāha avagrahau samau
varṣopalaḥ tu karakāḥ megha channe hni durdinam
antardhā vyavadhā puṃsi tu antardhiḥ apavāraṇam
apidhāna tirodhāna pidhāna ācchādanāni ca
himāṃśuḥ candramāḥ candraḥ induḥ kumudabāndhavaḥ

original: (1.3.206) kalā tu ṣoḍaśo bhāgo bimbo 'strī maṇḍalaṃ triṣu
analyzed: kalā tu ṣoḍaśaḥ bhāgaḥ strī maṇḍalam triṣu
bhittam śakala khaṇḍe vā puṃsi ardhaḥ ṛdham sama iṃśake

original: (1.3.209) kalaṅkāṅkau lāñchanaṃ ca cihnaṃ lakṣma ca lakṣaṇam
analyzed: kalaṅka aṅkau lāñchanam ca cihnam lakṣma ca lakṣaṇam
suṣamā paramā śobhā śobhā kāntiḥ dyutiḥ chaviḥ
avaśyāyaḥ tu nīhāraḥ tuṣāraḥ tuhinam himam

original: (1.3.213) śītaṃ guṇe tadvadarthāḥ suṣīmaḥ śiśiro jaḍaḥ
analyzed: śītam guṇe tadvat arthāḥ suṣīmaḥ śiśiraḥ jaḍaḥ
dhruva auttānapādiḥ syāt agastyaḥ kumbhasambhavaḥ
maitrāvaruṇiḥ asya eva lopāmudrā sadharmiṇī

original: (1.3.217) nakṣatramṛkṣaṃ bhaṃ tārā tārakāpyuḍu vā striyām
analyzed: nakṣatram ṛkṣam bham tārā tārakā api uḍu vā striyām
śvinī ityādi tārāḥ aśvayuj aśvinī
rādhā viśākhā puṣye tu sidhya tiṣyau śraviṣṭhayā

original: (1.3.220) samā dhaniṣṭhāḥ syuḥ proṣṭhapadā bhādrapadāḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: samāḥ dhaniṣṭhāḥ syuḥ proṣṭhapadāḥ bhādrapadāḥ striyaḥ
mṛgaśīrṣam mṛgaśiraḥ tasmin eva āgrahāyaṇī
ilvalāḥ tad śiraḥ deśe tārakāḥ nivasanti yāḥ
jīvaḥ āṅgirasaḥ vācaspatiḥ citraśikhaṇḍijaḥ

original: (1.3.225) śukro daityaguruḥ kāvya uśanā bhārgavaḥ kaviḥ
analyzed: śukraḥ daityaguruḥ kāvyaḥ uśanāḥ bhārgavaḥ kaviḥ
rauhiṇeyaḥ budhaḥ saumyaḥ samau sauri śanaiśvarau
tamaḥ tu rāhuḥ svarbhānuḥ saiṃhikeyaḥ vidhuntudaḥ
saptarṣayaḥ marīci atri mukhāḥ citraśikhaṇḍinaḥ
rāśīnām udayaḥ lagnam te tu meṣa vṛṣa ādayaḥ
sūra sūrya aryama āditya dvādaśātma divākarāḥ
bhāskara ahaskara bradhna prabhākara vibhākarāḥ
bhāsvat vivasvat saptāśva haridaśva uṣṇaraśmayaḥ
vikartana arka mārtaṇḍa mihira aruṇa pūṣaṇaḥ
dyumaṇiḥ taraṇiḥ mitraḥ citrabhānuḥ virocanaḥ
vibhāvasuḥ grahapatiḥ tviṣāṃpatiḥ aharpatiḥ
bhānuḥ haṃsaḥ sahasrāṃśuḥ tapanaḥ savitā raviḥ
inaḥ bhagaḥ bhāma nidhiḥ cām śumālī añjinīpatiḥ
māṭharaḥ piṅgalaḥ daṇḍaḥ caṇḍāṃśoḥ paripārśvakāḥ
pariveṣaḥ tu paridhiḥ upasūryaka maṇḍale
kiraṇa usra mayūkhām śuc gabhasti ghṛṇi raśmayaḥ
bhānuḥ karaḥ marīciḥ strīpuṃsayoḥ dīdhitiḥ striyām
syuḥ prabhā ruc ruciḥ tviṣ bhā ābhāḥ chavi dyuti dīptayaḥ

original: (1.3.248) rociḥ śocirubhe klībe prakāśo dyota ātapaḥ
analyzed: rociḥ śociḥ ubhe klībe prakāśaḥ dyotaḥ ātapaḥ

original: (1.3.249) koṣṇaṃ kavoṣṇaṃ mandoṣṇaṃ kaduṣṇaṃ triṣu tadvati
analyzed: koṣṇam kavoṣṇam mandoṣṇam kaduṣṇam triṣu tadvati
kāla vargaḥ
kālaḥ samayaḥ pi atha pakṣatiḥ

original: (1.4.252) pratipad dve ime strītve tadādyāstithayo dvayoḥ
analyzed: pratipad dve ime strītve tad ādyāḥ tithayaḥ dvayoḥ

original: (1.4.253) ghasro dināhanī vā tu klībe divasavāsarau
analyzed: ghasraḥ dina ahanī vā tu klībe divasa vāsarau
pratyūṣaḥ harmukham kalyam uṣaḥ pratyuṣasī api

original: (1.4.255) vyuṣṭaṃ vibhātaṃ dve klībe puṃsi gosarga iṣyate
analyzed: vyuṣṭam vibhātam dve klībe puṃsi gosargaḥ iṣyate

original: (1.4.256) prabhātaṃ ca dinānte tu sāyaṃ sandhyā pitṛprasūḥ
analyzed: prabhātam ca dina ante tu sāyam sandhyā pitṛprasūḥ
prāhṇa aparāhṇa madhyāhnaḥ trisandhyam atha śarvarī
niśā niśīthinī rātriḥ triyāmā kṣaṇadā kṣapā
vibhāvarī tamasvinyau rajanī yāminī tamī
tamisrā tāmasī rātriḥ jyautsnī candrikayā anvitā
āgāmi vartamāna arha yuktāyām niśi pakṣiṇī
gaṇarātram niśāḥ bahvyaḥ pradoṣaḥ rajanīmukham
ardharātra niśīthau dvau dvau yāma praharau samau
sa parvasandhiḥ pratipad pañcadaśyoḥ yat antaram

original: (1.4.265) pakṣāntau pañcadaśyau dve paurṇamāsī tu paurṇimā
analyzed: pakṣa antau pañcadaśyau dve paurṇamāsī tu paurṇimā
kalā hīne sā anumatiḥ pūrṇe rākā niśākare
amāvāsyā tu amāvasyā darśaḥ sūryendusaṃgamaḥ

original: (1.4.268) sā dṛṣṭenduḥ sinīvālī sā naṣṭendukalā kuhūḥ
analyzed: sā dṛṣṭa induḥ sinīvālī sā naṣṭa indu kalā kuhūḥ

original: (1.4.269) uparāgo graho rāhugraste tvindau ca pūṣṇi ca
analyzed: uparāgaḥ grahaḥ rāhu graste tu indau ca pūṣṇi ca
sa upaplava uparaktau dvau agnyutpātaḥ upāhitaḥ
ekayā uktyā puṣpavantau divākara niśākarau

original: (1.4.272) aṣṭādaśa nimeṣāstu kāṣṭā triṃśat tu tāḥ kalā
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa nimeṣāḥ tu kā aṣṭā triṃśat tu tāḥ kalā

original: (1.4.273) tāstu triṃśat kṣaṇaste tu muhūrto dvādaśāstriyām
analyzed: tāḥ tu triṃśat kṣaṇaḥ te tu muhūrtaḥ dvādaśa astriyām

original: (1.4.274) te tu triṃśadahorātraḥ pakṣaste daśapañca ca
analyzed: te tu triṃśat ahorātraḥ pakṣaḥ te daśa pañca ca
pakṣau pūrva aparau śukla kṛṣṇau māsaḥ tu tau ubhau

original: (1.4.276) dvau dvau mārgādi māsau syādṛtustairayanaṃ tribhiḥ
analyzed: dvau dvau mārga ādi māsau syāt ṛtuḥ taiḥ ayanam tribhiḥ
ayane dve gatiḥ udak dakṣiṇa arkasya vatsaraḥ
sama rātri dive kāle viṣuvat viṣuvam ca tat

original: (1.4.279) puṣpayuktā paurṇamāsī pauṣī māse tu yatra sā
analyzed: puṣpa yuktā paurṇamāsī pauṣī māse tu yatra sā
nāmnā sa pauṣaḥ māgha ādyāḥ ca evam ekādaśā apare
mārgaśīrṣe sahāḥ mārgaḥ āgrahāyaṇikaḥ ca saḥ

original: (1.4.282) pauṣe taiṣasahasyau dvau tapā māghe 'tha phālgune
analyzed: pauṣe taiṣa sahasyau dvau tapāḥ māghe phālgune
syāt tapasyaḥ phālgunikaḥ syāt caitre caitrikaḥ madhuḥ

original: (1.4.284) vaiśākhe mādhavo rādho jyeṣṭhe śukraḥ śucistvayam
analyzed: vaiśākhe mādhavaḥ rādhaḥ jyeṣṭhe śukraḥ śuciḥ tu ayam

original: (1.4.285) āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe tu syānnabhāḥ śrāvaṇikaśca saḥ
analyzed: āṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe tu syāt nabhāḥ śrāvaṇikaḥ ca saḥ
syuḥ nabhasya prauṣṭhapada bhādra bhādrapadāḥ samāḥ
syāt āśvine iṣaḥ pi āśvayujaḥ pi syāt tu kārtike
bāhula ūrjau kārtikikaḥ hemantaḥ śiśiraḥ striyām
vasante puṣpasamayaḥ surabhiḥ grīṣmaḥ ūṣmakaḥ
nidāghaḥ uṣṇopagamaḥ uṣṇaḥ ūṣmāgamaḥ tapaḥ

original: (1.4.291) striyāṃ prāvṛṭ striyāṃ bhūmni varṣā atha śaratstriyām
analyzed: striyām prāvṛṣ striyām bhūmni varṣāḥ atha śarad striyām

original: (1.4.292) ṣaḍamī ṛtavaḥ puṃsi mārgādīnāṃ yugaiḥ kramāt
analyzed: ṣaṭ amī ṛtavaḥ puṃsi mārga ādīnām yugaiḥ kramāt
saṃvatsaraḥ vatsaraḥ bdaḥ hāyanaḥ strī śarad samāḥ
māsena syāt ahorātraḥ paitraḥ varṣeṇa daivataḥ

original: (1.4.295) daive yugasahasre dve brāhmaḥ kalpau tu tau nṛṇām
analyzed: daive yuga sahasre dve brāhmaḥ kalpau tu tau nṛṇām
manvantaram tu divyānām yugānām ekasaptatiḥ

original: (1.4.297) saṃvartaḥ pralayaḥ kalpaḥ kṣayaḥ kalpānta ityapi
analyzed: saṃvartaḥ pralayaḥ kalpaḥ kṣayaḥ kalpāntaḥ iti api
astrī paṅkam pumān pāpmā pāpam kilbiṣa kalmaṣam
kaluṣam vṛjina enaḥ gham aṃhaḥ durita duṣkṛtam
syāt dharmam astriyām puṇya śreyasī sukṛtam vṛṣaḥ
syāt ānandathuḥ ānandaḥ śarma śāta sukhāni ca

original: (1.4.303) śvaḥ śreyasaṃ śivaṃ bhadraṃ kalyāṇaṃ maṅgalaṃ śubham
analyzed: śvas śreyasam śivam bhadram kalyāṇam maṅgalam śubham
bhāvukam bhavikam bhavyam kuśalam kṣemam astriyām

original: (1.4.305) śastaṃ cātha triṣu dravye pāpaṃ puṇyaṃ sukhādi ca
analyzed: śastam ca atha triṣu dravye pāpam puṇyam sukha ādi ca
praśasta vācakāni amūni ayaḥ śubha āvahaḥ vidhiḥ

original: (1.4.308) daivaṃ diṣṭaṃ bhāgadheyaṃ bhāgyaṃ strī niyatirvidhiḥ
analyzed: daivam diṣṭam bhāgadheyam bhāgyam strī niyatiḥ vidhiḥ
hetuḥ nā kāraṇam bījam nidānam tu ādikāraṇam

original: (1.4.310) kṣetrajña ātmā puruṣaḥ pradhānaṃ prakṛtiḥ striyām
analyzed: kṣetrajñaḥ ātmā puruṣaḥ pradhānam prakṛtiḥ striyām
viśeṣaḥ kālikaḥ vasthā guṇāḥ sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ
prāṇī tu cetanaḥ janmī jantu janyu śarīriṇaḥ
jātiḥ jātam ca sāmānyam vyaktiḥ tu pṛthak ātma tā

original: (1.4.315) cittaṃ tu ceto hṛdayaṃ svāntaṃ hṛnmānasaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: cittam tu cetaḥ hṛdayam svāntam hṛd mānasam manaḥ
dhī vargaḥ

original: (1.5.316) buddhirmanīṣā dhiṣaṇā dhīḥ prajñā śemuṣī matiḥ
analyzed: buddhiḥ manīṣā dhiṣaṇā dhīḥ prajñā śemuṣī matiḥ
dhīḥ dhāraṇāvatī medhā saṃkalpaḥ karma mānasam
avadhānam samādhānam praṇidhānam tathā eva ca

original: (1.5.321) vimarśo bhāvanā caiva vāsanā ca nigadyate
analyzed: vimarśaḥ bhāvanā ca eva vāsanā ca nigadyate
adhyāhāraḥ tarkaḥ ūhaḥ vicikitsā tu saṃśayaḥ
sandeha dvāparau ca atha samau nirṇaya niścayau
mithyā dṛṣṭiḥ nāstika tā vyāpādaḥ droha cintanam
samau siddhānta rāddhāntau bhrāntiḥ mithyāmatiḥ bhramaḥ
pratijñānam niyama āśrava saṃśravāḥ
aṅgīkāra abhyupagama pratiśrava samādhayaḥ
mokṣe dhīḥ jñānam anyatra vijñānam śilpa śāstrayoḥ
mokṣaḥ pavargaḥ striyām
rūpam śabdaḥ gandha rasa sparśāḥ ca viṣayāḥ amī
gocarāḥ indriya arthāḥ ca hṛṣīkam viṣayi indriyam
tuvaraḥ tu kaṣāyaḥ strī madhuraḥ lavaṇaḥ kaṭuḥ

original: (1.5.335) tikto 'mlaśca rasāḥ puṃsi tadvatsu ṣaḍamī triṣu
analyzed: tiktaḥ mlaḥ ca rasāḥ puṃsi tadvatsu ṣaṭ amī triṣu
vimarda utthe parimalaḥ gandhe jana manohare
āmodaḥ vācyaliṅga tvam ā guṇāt
tu
pūti gandhaḥ tu durgandhaḥ visram syāt āma gandhi yat
śukla śubhra śuci śveta viśada śyeta pāṇḍarāḥ
avadātaḥ sitaḥ gauraḥ valakṣaḥ dhavalaḥ rjunaḥ
hariṇaḥ pāṇḍuraḥ pāṇḍuḥ īṣat pāṇḍuḥ tu dhūsaraḥ

original: (1.5.345) pīto gauro haridrābhaḥ palāśo harito harit
analyzed: pītaḥ gauraḥ haridrā ābhaḥ palāśaḥ haritaḥ harit
avyaktarāgaḥ tu aruṇaḥ śveta raktaḥ tu pāṭalaḥ
śyāvaḥ syāt kapiśaḥ dhūmra dhūmalau kṛṣṇa lohite
citram kirmīra kalmāṣa śabala etāḥ ca karbure
guṇe śukla ādayaḥ puṃsi guṇi liṅgāḥ tu tadvati
śabda vargaḥ

original: (1.6.352) brāhmī tu bhāratī bhāṣā gīrvāgvāṇī sarasvatī
analyzed: brāhmī tu bhāratī bhāṣā gīḥ vāc vāṇī sarasvatī
vyāhāraḥ uktiḥ lapitam bhāṣitam vacanam vacaḥ
syāt śāstre śabdaḥ tu vācakaḥ

original: (1.6.355) tiṅ subantacayo vākyaṃ kriyā vā kārakānvitā
analyzed: tiṅ sup anta cayaḥ vākyam kriyā vā kāraka anvitā

original: (1.6.356) śrutiḥ strī veda āmnāyastrayī dharmastu tadvidhiḥ
analyzed: śrutiḥ strī vedaḥ āmnāyaḥ trayī dharmaḥ tu tad vidhiḥ
striyām ṛc sāma yajuṣī iti vedāḥ trayaḥ trayī
śikṣā ityādi śruteḥ aṅgam oṅkāra praṇavau samau
itihāsaḥ purāvṛttam udātta ādyāḥ trayaḥ svarāḥ
ānvīkṣikī daṇḍanītiḥ tarkavidyā arthaśāstrayoḥ
ākhyāyikā upalabdha arthā purāṇam pañca lakṣaṇam
smṛtiḥ tu dharma saṃhitā samāhṛtiḥ tu saṃgrahaḥ
samasyā tu samāsārthā kiṃvadantī jana śrutiḥ
vārtā pravṛttiḥ vṛttānte udantaḥ syāt atha āhvayaḥ

original: (1.6.366) ākhyāhve abhidhānaṃ ca nāmadheyaṃ ca nāma ca
analyzed: ākhyā āhve abhidhānam ca nāmadheyam ca nāma ca
hūtiḥ ākāraṇa āhvānam saṃhūtiḥ bahubhiḥ kṛtā
vivādaḥ vyavahāraḥ syāt upanyāsaḥ tu vāṅmukham
upoddhātaḥ udāhāraḥ śapanam śapathaḥ pumān
praśnaḥ nuyogaḥ pṛcchā ca prativākya uttare same
mithyā abhiyogaḥ bhyākhyānam atha mithyā abhiśaṃsanam
abhiśāpaḥ praṇādaḥ tu śabdaḥ syāt anurāga jaḥ

original: (1.6.373) yaśaḥ kīrtiḥ samajñā ca stavaḥ stotraṃ stutirnutiḥ
analyzed: yaśaḥ kīrtiḥ samajñā ca stavaḥ stotram stutiḥ nutiḥ
āmreḍitam dvis tris uktam uccairghuṣṭam tu ghoṣaṇā
kākuḥ striyām vikāraḥ yaḥ śoka bhīti ādibhiḥ dhvaneḥ
avarṇa ākṣepa nirvāda parīvāda apavāda vat

original: (1.6.377) upakrośo jugupsā ca kutsā nindā ca garhaṇe
analyzed: upakrośaḥ jugupsā ca kutsā nindā ca garhaṇe
pāruṣyam ativādaḥ syāt bhartsanam tu apakāra gīḥ
yaḥ sa nindaḥ upālambhaḥ tatra syāt paribhāṣaṇam

original: (1.6.380) tatra tvākṣāraṇā yaḥ syādākrośo maithunaṃ prati
analyzed: tatra tu ākṣāraṇā yaḥ syāt ākrośaḥ maithunam prati
syāt ābhāṣaṇam ālāpaḥ pralāpaḥ narthakam vacaḥ
anulāpaḥ muhurbhāṣā vilāpaḥ paridevanam
vipralāpaḥ virodha uktiḥ saṃlāpaḥ bhāṣaṇam mithas
supralāpaḥ suvacanam apalāpaḥ tu nihnavaḥ
codyama ākṣepa abhiyogau śāpa ākrośau dureṣaṇā

original: (1.6.386) astrī cāṭu caṭu ślāghā premṇā mithyāvikatthanam
analyzed: astrī cāṭu caṭu ślāghā premṇā mithyā vikatthanam
sandeśa vāc vācikam syāt vāc bhedāḥ tu triṣu uttare
ruśatī vāc akalyāṇī syāt kalyā tu śubha ātmikā
atyartha madhuram sāntvam saṃgatam hṛdayaṅgamam
niṣṭhuram paruṣam grāmyam aślīlam sūnṛtam priye
satye saṃkula kliṣṭe paraspara parāhate
lupta varṇa padam grastam nirastam tvarita uditam
jambūkṛtam sa niṣṭīvam abaddham syāt anarthakam
anakṣaram avācyam syāt āhatam tu mṛṣārthakam
sa ulluṭhanam tu sa utprāsam maṇitam rati kūjitam
śrāvyam hṛdyam manohāri vispaṣṭam prakaṭa uditam
atha mliṣṭam avispaṣṭam vitatham tu anṛtam vacaḥ
satyam tathyam ṛtam samyak amūni triṣu tadvati
śabde nināda ninada dhvani dhvāna rava svanāḥ
svāna nirghoṣa nirhrāda nāda nisvāna nisvanāḥ
ārava ārāva saṃrāva virāvāḥ atha marmaraḥ
svanite vastra parṇānām bhūṣaṇānām tu śiñjitam
nikvāṇaḥ nikvaṇaḥ kvāṇaḥ kvaṇaḥ kvaṇanam iti api
vīṇāyāḥ kvaṇite pra ādeḥ prakvāṇa prakvaṇa ādayaḥ
kolāhalaḥ kalakalaḥ tiraścām vāśitam rutam
strī pratiśrut pratidhvāne gītam gānam ime same
nāṭya vargaḥ
niṣāda ṛṣabha gāndhāra ṣaḍja madhyama dhaivatāḥ
pañcamaḥ ca iti amī sapta tantrī kaṇṭha utthitāḥ svarāḥ

original: (1.7.409) kākalī tu kale sūkṣme dhvanī tu madhurāsphuṭe
analyzed: kākalī tu kale sūkṣme dhvanī tu madhura asphuṭe
kalaḥ mandraḥ tu gambhīre ti uccaiḥ trayaḥ triṣu
nṛṇām urasi madhya sthaḥ dvāviṃśatividhaḥ dhvaniḥ
sa mandraḥ kaṇṭha madhya sthaḥ tāraḥ śirasi gīyate
samanvita layaḥ tu ekatālaḥ vīṇā tu vallakī

original: (1.7.414) tripañcī sā tu tantrībhiḥ saptabhiḥ parivādinī
analyzed: tripañcī sā tu tantrībhiḥ saptabhiḥ parivādinī
vaṃśa ādikam tu suṣiram kāṃsya tāla ādikam ghanam
caturvidham idam vādyam vāditra ātodya nāmakam
mṛdaṅgāḥ murajāḥ bhedāḥ tu aṅkya āliṅgya ūrdhvakāḥ trayaḥ

original: (1.7.419) syād yaśaḥpaṭaho ḍhakkā bherī strī dundubhiḥ pumān
analyzed: syāt yaśaḥpaṭahaḥ ḍhakkā bherī strī dundubhiḥ pumān

original: (1.7.420) ānakaḥ paṭaho 'strī syāt koṇo vīṇādi vādanam
analyzed: ānakaḥ paṭahaḥ strī syāt koṇaḥ vīṇā ādi vādanam
vīṇādaṇḍaḥ pravālaḥ syāt kakubhaḥ tu prasevakaḥ
kolambakaḥ tu syāḥ upanāhaḥ nibandhanam
vādya prabhedāḥ ḍamaru maḍḍu ḍiṇḍima jharjharāḥ
mardalaḥ paṇavaḥ nye ca nartakī lāsike same

original: (1.7.425) vilambitaṃ drutaṃ madhyaṃ tattvamogho ghanaṃ kramāt
analyzed: vilambitam drutam madhyam tattvam oghaḥ ghanam kramāt
tālaḥ kālakriyā mānam layaḥ sāmya mamathā striyām

original: (1.7.427) tāṇḍavaṃ naṭanaṃ nāṭyaṃ lāsyaṃ nṛtyaṃ ca nartane
analyzed: tāṇḍavam naṭanam nāṭyam lāsyam nṛtyam ca nartane
tauryatrikam nṛtya gīta vādyam nāṭyam idam trayam
bhrakuṃsaḥ ca bhrukuṃsaḥ ca bhrūkuṃsaḥ ca iti nartakaḥ
strī veṣa dhārī puruṣaḥ nāṭya uktau gaṇikā añjukā
bhaginī patiḥ āvuttaḥ bhāvaḥ vidvān atha āvukaḥ
janakaḥ yuvarājaḥ tu kumāraḥ bhartṛdārakaḥ
rājā bhaṭṭārakaḥ devaḥ tad sutā bhartṛ dārikā
devī kṛtābhiṣekāyām itarāsu tu bhaṭṭinī
abrahmaṇyam avadhya uktau rāja śyālaḥ tu rāṣṭriyaḥ
ambā mātā atha bālā syāt   āryaḥ tu māriṣaḥ

original: (1.7.437) attikā bhaginī jyeṣṭhā niṣṭhā nirvahaṇe same
analyzed: attikā bhaginī jyeṣṭhā niṣṭhā nirvahaṇe same

original: (1.7.438) haṇḍe hañje halāhvāne nīcāṃ ceṭīṃ sakhīṃ prati
analyzed: haṇḍe hañje halā āhvāne nīcām ceṭīm sakhīm prati
aṅgahāraḥ ṅgavikṣepaḥ vyañjaka abhinayau samau
nirvṛtte tu aṅga sattvābhyām dve triṣu āṅgika sāttvike
śṛṅgāra vīra karuṇā adbhuta hāsya bhayānakāḥ
bībhatsa raudrau ca rasāḥ śṛṅgāraḥ śuciḥ ujjvalaḥ
utsāha vardhanaḥ vīraḥ kāruṇyam karuṇā ghṛṇā
kṛpā dayā anukampā syāt anukrośaḥ pi atho hasaḥ

original: (1.7.445) hāso hāsyaṃ ca bībhatsaṃ vikṛtaṃ triṣvidaṃ dvayam
analyzed: hāsaḥ hāsyam ca bībhatsam vikṛtam triṣu idam dvayam
vismayaḥ dbhutam āścaryam citram api atha bhairavam

original: (1.7.447) dāruṇaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ bhīṣmaṃ ghoraṃ bhīmaṃ bhayānakam
analyzed: dāruṇam bhīṣaṇam bhīṣmam ghoram bhīmam bhayānakam
bhayaṅkaram pratibhayam raudram tu ugram amī triṣu
caturdaśa daraḥ trāsaḥ bhītiḥ bhīḥ sādhvasam bhayam
garvaḥ bhimānaḥ haṅkāraḥ mānaḥ citta samunnatiḥ
darpaḥ valokaḥ vaṣṭambhaḥ cittodrekaḥ smayaḥ madaḥ
anādaraḥ paribhavaḥ parībhāvaḥ tiraskriyā
rīḍha avamānana avajñā avahelanam asūrkṣaṇam
mandākṣam hrīḥ trapā vrīḍā lajjā sa apatrapā anyatas
kṣāntiḥ titikṣā abhidhyā tu parasya viṣaye spṛhā
akṣāntiḥ īrṣyā asūyā tu doṣa āropaḥ guṇeṣu api

original: (1.7.458) vairaṃ virodho vidveṣo manyuśokau tu śuk striyām
analyzed: vairam virodhaḥ vidveṣaḥ manyu śokau tu śuc striyām
paścāttāpaḥ nutāpaḥ ca vipratīsāraḥ iti api
kopa krodha amarṣa roṣa pratighāḥ ruṭ kṛ dhau striyau
śucau tu carite śīlam unmādaḥ citta vibhramaḥ

original: (1.7.462) premā nā priyatā hārdaṃ premasneho 'tha dohadam
analyzed: premā nā priya tā hārdam dohadam

original: (1.7.463) icchā kāṅkṣā spṛhehā tṛḍ vāñchā lipsā manorathaḥ
analyzed: icchā kāṅkṣā spṛhā īhā tṛṣ vāñchā lipsā manorathaḥ
kāmaḥ bhilāṣaḥ tarṣaḥ ca tyartham lālasāḥ dvayoḥ
upādhiḥ nā dharma cintā puṃsi ādhiḥ mānasī vyathā
syāt cintā smṛtiḥ ādhyānam utkaṇṭhā utkalike same
utsāhaḥ dhī avasāyaḥ syāt sa vīrya mati śakti bhāj
kapaṭaḥ strī vyāja dambha upadhayaḥ chadma kaitave
kusṛtiḥ nikṛtiḥ śāṭhyam pramādaḥ nava dhāna tā

original: (1.7.470) kautūhalaṃ kautukaṃ ca kutukaṃ ca kutūhalam
analyzed: kautūhalam kautukam ca kutukam ca kutūhalam
strīṇām vilāsa bibboka vibhramāḥ lalitam tathā
helā līlā iti amī hāvāḥ kriyāḥ śṛṅgāra bhāva jāḥ

original: (1.7.473) dravakeliparīhāsāḥ krīḍā līlā ca narma ca
analyzed: drava keli parīhāsāḥ krīḍā līlā ca narma ca

original: (1.7.474) vyājo 'padeśo lakṣyaṃ ca krīḍā khelā ca kūrdanam
analyzed: vyājaḥ upadeśaḥ lakṣyam ca krīḍā khelā ca kūrdanam
gharmaḥ nidāghaḥ svedaḥ syāt pralayaḥ naṣṭaceṣṭa tā
avahittha ākāraguptiḥ samau saṃvega saṃbhramau

original: (1.7.477) syādācchuritakaṃ hāsaḥ sotprāsaḥ sa manāk smitam
analyzed: syāt ācchuritakam hāsaḥ sa utprāsaḥ sa manāk smitam
madhyamaḥ syāt vihasitam romāñcaḥ romaharṣaṇam

original: (1.7.479) kranditaṃ ruditam kruṣṭaṃ jṛmbhastu triṣu jṛmbhaṇam
analyzed: kranditam ruditam kruṣṭam jṛmbhaḥ tu triṣu jṛmbhaṇam
vipralambhaḥ visaṃvādaḥ riṅgaṇam skhalanam same

original: (1.7.481) syānnidrā śayanaṃ svāpaḥ svapnaḥ saṃveśa ityapi
analyzed: syāt nidrā śayanam svāpaḥ svapnaḥ saṃveśaḥ iti api
tandrī pramīlā bhrakuṭiḥ bhrukuṭiḥ bhrūkuṭiḥ striyām
adṛṣṭiḥ syāt asaumye saṃsiddhi prakṛtī tu ime
svarūpam ca svabhāvaḥ ca nisargaḥ ca atha vepathuḥ

original: (1.7.485) kampo 'tha kṣaṇa uddharṣo maha uddhava utsavaḥ
analyzed: kampaḥ tha kṣaṇaḥ uddharṣaḥ mahaḥ uddhavaḥ utsavaḥ
pātāla bhogi vargaḥ
kuharam suṣiram vivaram bilam

original: (1.8.488) chidraṃ nirvyathanaṃ rokaṃ randhraṃ śvabhraṃ vapā suṣiḥ
analyzed: chidram nirvyathanam rokam randhram śvabhram vapā suṣiḥ

original: (1.8.489) gartāvaṭau bhuvi śvabhre sarandhre suṣiraṃ triṣu
analyzed: garta avaṭau bhuvi śvabhre sa randhre suṣiram triṣu
andhakāraḥ striyām dhvāntam tamisram timiram tamaḥ
dhvānte gāḍhe ndhatamasam kṣīṇe vatamasam tamaḥ
viṣvaksaṃtamasam nāgāḥ kādraveyāḥ tad īśvare
śeṣaḥ nantaḥ vāsukiḥ tu sarpa rājaḥ gonase
tilitsaḥ syāt ajagare śayuḥ vāhasaḥ iti ubhau
alagardaḥ jalavyālaḥ samau rājila ḍuṇḍumau
āśīviṣaḥ viṣadharaḥ cakrī vyālaḥ sarīsṛpaḥ
darvīkaraḥ dīrghapṛṣṭhaḥ dandaśūkaḥ bileśayaḥ
kumbhīnasaḥ phaṇadharaḥ hariḥ bhogadharaḥ tathā
aheḥ śarīram bhogaḥ syāt āśīḥ api ahidaṃṣṭrikā

original: (1.8.505) triṣvāheyaṃ viṣāsthyādi sphaṭāyāṃ tu phaṇā dvayoḥ
analyzed: triṣu āheyam viṣa asthi ādi sphaṭāyām tu phaṇā dvayoḥ
samau kañcuka nirmokau kṣveḍaḥ tu garalam viṣam
puṃsi klībe ca kākola kālakūṭa halāhalāḥ
dāradaḥ vatsanābhaḥ ca viṣa bhedāḥ amī nava
naraka vargaḥ
syāt nārakaḥ tu narakaḥ nirayaḥ durgatiḥ striyām
tad bhedāḥ tapana avīci mahāraurava rauravāḥ
saṃghātaḥ kālasūtram ca ityādyāḥ sattvāḥ tu nārakāḥ
pretāḥ vaitaraṇī sindhuḥ syāt alakṣmīḥ tu
kāraṇā tu yātanā tīvra vedanā
pīḍā bādhā vyathā duḥkham āmanasyam prasūti jam
syāt kaṣṭam kṛcchram ābhīlam triṣu eṣām bhedya gāmi yat
vārivargaḥ
udanvān udadhiḥ sindhuḥ sarasvān sāgaraḥ rṇavaḥ
tasya prabhedāḥ kṣīrodaḥ lavaṇodaḥ tathā apare

original: (1.10.522) āpaḥ strī bhūmni vārvāri salilaṃ kamalaṃ jalaṃ
analyzed: āpaḥ strī bhūmni vār vāri salilam kamalam jalam
payaḥ kīlālam amṛtam jīvanam bhuvanam vanam
kabandham udakam pāthaḥ puṣkaram sarvatomukham
bhaṅgaḥ taraṅgaḥ ūrmiḥ vā striyām vīci ratha ūrmiṣu
mahatsu ullola kallolau syāt āvartaḥ mbhasām bhramaḥ
pṛṣanti bindu pṛṣatāḥ pumāṃsaḥ vipruṣaḥ striyām
cakrāṇi puṭabhedāḥ syuḥ bhramāḥ ca jalanirgamāḥ

original: (1.10.531) kūlaṃ rodhaśca tīraṃ ca pratīraṃ ca taṭaṃ triṣu
analyzed: kūlam rodhaḥ ca tīram ca pratīram ca taṭam triṣu
pārāvāre para arvācī tīre pātram tad antaram
dvīpaḥ striyām antarīpam yat antar vāriṇas taṭam
toya utthitam tat pulinam saikatam sikatāmayam
jalocchvāsāḥ parīvāhāḥ kūpakāḥ tu vidārakāḥ
nāvyam tri liṅgam nautārye striyām nauḥ taraṇiḥ tariḥ

original: (1.10.538) uḍupaṃ tu plavaḥ kolaḥ sroto 'mbusaraṇaṃ svataḥ
analyzed: uḍupam tu plavaḥ kolaḥ srotaḥ mbu saraṇam svatas
ātaraḥ tarapaṇyam syāt droṇī kāṣṭā ambuvāhinī
sāṃyātrikaḥ pota vaṇij karṇadhāraḥ tu nāvikaḥ

original: (1.10.543) abhriḥ strī kāṣṭakuddālaḥ sekapātraṃ tu secanam
analyzed: abhriḥ strī kāṣṭa kuddālaḥ seka pātram tu secanam
klībe rdha nāvam nāvaḥ ṛdhe tīta nauke tinu triṣu
triṣu āgādhāt prasannā u cchas kaluṣaḥ nacchas āvilaḥ
nimnam gabhīram gambhīram uttānam tad viparyaye
agādham a tala sparśe kaivarte dāśa dhīvarau
ānāyaḥ puṃsi jālam syāt śaṇa sūtram pavitrakam
syāt
visāraḥ śakulī ca atha gaḍakaḥ śakulārbhakaḥ
sahasra daṃṣṭraḥ pāṭhīnaḥ ulūpī śiśukaḥ samau
kṣudrāṇḍa matsyasaṃghātaḥ potādhānam atho jhaṣāḥ
rohitaḥ madguraḥ śālaḥ rājīvaḥ śakulaḥ timiḥ
timiṅgala ādayaḥ ca atha yādāṃsi jala jantavaḥ
tad bhedāḥ śiśumāra udra śaṅkavaḥ makara ādayaḥ
syāt kulīraḥ karkaṭakaḥ kūrme kamaṭha kacchapau
grāhaḥ vahāraḥ nakraḥ tu mahīlatā

original: (1.10.561) raktapā tu jalaukāyāṃ striyāṃ bhūmni jalaukasaḥ
analyzed: raktapā tu jalaukāyām striyām bhūmni jalaukasaḥ
bheke maṇḍūka varṣābhū śālūra plava dardurāḥ

original: (1.10.565) śilī gaṇḍūpadī bhekī varṣābhvī kamaṭhī ḍuliḥ

analyzed: madgurasya priyā śṛṅgī durnāmā dīrghakośikā
jalāśayāḥ jalādhārāḥ tatra agādha jalaḥ hradaḥ
āhāvaḥ tu nipānam syāt upa kūpa jalāśaye

original: (1.10.569) puṃsyevāndhuḥ prahiḥ kūpa udapānṃ tu puṃsi vā
analyzed: puṃsi eva andhuḥ prahiḥ kūpaḥ tu puṃsi vā
nemiḥ trikā asya vīnāhaḥ mukha bandhanam asya yat
puṣkariṇyām tu khātam syāt akhātam devakhātakam
strī kāsāraḥ sarasī saraḥ

original: (1.10.573) veśantaḥ palvalaṃ cālpasaro vāpī tu dīrghikā
analyzed: veśantaḥ palvalam ca alpa saraḥ vāpī tu dīrghikā
kheyam tu parikhā ādhāraḥ tu ambhasām yatra dhāraṇam
syāt ālavālam āvālam āvāpaḥ tha nadī sarit
bhāgīrathī tripathagā trisrotāḥ bhīṣmasūḥ api
revā tu narmadā somodbhavā mekalakanyakā

original: (1.10.584) śatadrustu śutudriḥ syādvipāśā tu vipāṭ striyām
analyzed: śatadruḥ tu śutudriḥ syāt vipāśā tu vipāś striyām
śoṇaḥ hiraṇyavāhaḥ syāt kulyā alpā kṛtrimā sarit
śarāvatī vetravatī candrabhāgā sarasvatī
kāverī saritaḥ nyāḥ ca sambhedaḥ sindhusaṅgamaḥ

original: (1.10.588) dvayoḥ praṇālī payasaḥ padavyāṃ triṣu tūttarau
analyzed: dvayoḥ praṇālī payasaḥ padavyām triṣu tu uttarau
devikāyām sarayvām ca bhave dāvika sāravau
tu
syāt utpalam kuvalayam atha nīlāmbujanma ca
indīvaram ca nīle smin site kumuda kairave
śālūkam eṣām kandaḥ syāt vāriparṇī tu kumbhikā
tu
kumudinyām nalinyām tu visinī padminī mukhāḥ
vā puṃsi padmam nalinam aravindam mahotpalam
sahasra patram kamalam śata patram kuśeśayam
paṅkeruham tāmarasam sārasam sarasīruham
bisaprasūna rājīva puṣkara ambhoruhāṇi ca
puṇḍarīkam sita ambhojam atha rakta saroruhe
raktotpalam kokanadam nālaḥ nālam atha astriyām
mṛṇālam bisam abja ādi kadambe khaṇḍam astriyām
karahāṭaḥ śiphā kandaḥ kiñjalkaḥ kesaraḥ striyām
kāṇḍa samāptiḥ
uktam svar vyoma diś kāla dhī śabda ādi sa nāṭyakam
pātāla bhogi narakam vāri ca eṣām ca saṅgatam
iti amarasiṃha kṛtau nāmaliṅgānuśāsane
svara ādi kāṇḍaḥ prathamaḥ sa aṅgaḥ eva samarthitaḥ
